scripts.script: CREATE TABLE DOMAIN ( ID BIGINT PRIMARY KEY, "DATE" VARCHAR(50), CATEGORY VARCHAR(1000), NAME VARCHAR(1000) )

CREATE TABLE META ( ID BIGINT PRIMARY KEY, DOMAIN_ID BIGINT, TITLE VARCHAR(2000), DES VARCHAR(4000), IMAGE VARCHAR(500), TIME VARCHAR(100), SOURCE_TIME VARCHAR(100), INDEX_STATUS INTEGER DEFAULT 0, URL VARCHAR(2000), CONSTRAINT META_FK FOREIGN KEY (DOMAIN_ID) REFERENCES DOMAIN (ID) )
CREATE TABLE CONTENT( META_ID BIGINT, "DATE" VARCHAR(50), CONTENT CLOB, CONSTRAINT CONTENT_FK FOREIGN KEY (META_ID) REFERENCES META(ID) )
CREATE TABLE RELATION( META_ID BIGINT, RELATION_ID BIGINT, PERCENT INTEGER )
CREATE TABLE IMAGE( ID VARCHAR(200) PRIMARY KEY, META_ID BIGINT, CONTENT_TYPE VARCHAR(200), NAME VARCHAR(200), IMAGE BLOB )
